name: Ultrapar Participações S.A.
description: Ultrapar Participações S.A. is a Brazilian company engaged in the production and distribution of fuels, chemicals, and logistics services. Founded in 1937, Ultrapar has become a significant player in the Brazilian market, primarily through its subsidiaries, which include Ipiranga, Ultracargo, and Oxiteno. Ipiranga is one of the leading retail fuel distribution companies in Brazil, operating a vast network of gas stations and convenience stores, offering a wide range of products and services to consumers. Ultracargo operates in the logistics segment, specializing in the storage and transportation of liquid bulk products, including fuels and chemicals. Oxiteno is a major producer of specialty chemicals and surfactants, serving various industries, including agriculture, personal care, and household products. Ultrapar is committed to innovation and sustainability, focusing on environmentally friendly practices across its operations, including the use of renewable fuels and efficient logistics solutions. The company aims to provide high-quality products while contributing to the economic development of Brazil and the well-being of its communities. With a robust business model and diversified operations, Ultrapar is well-positioned to capitalize on growth opportunities in the energy and chemicals sectors, both domestically and internationally.
ceo: Roberto S. D. M. de Souza

key_executives.name: Roberto S. D. M. de Souza

seo.meta_title: Ultrapar Participações S.A. | Fuel, Chemicals, and Logistics
seo.meta_description: Learn about Ultrapar Participações S.A., a leader in fuel distribution, chemical production, and logistics in Brazil. Explore their commitment to sustainability and innovation.

faq.question: What does Ultrapar do?
faq.answer: Ultrapar engages in fuel distribution, chemical production, and logistics services in Brazil.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Ultrapar?
faq.answer: Roberto S. D. M. de Souza is the CEO of Ultrapar Participações S.A.

faq.question: Where is Ultrapar headquartered?
faq.answer: Ultrapar is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil.

faq.question: What are Ultrapar's main products?
faq.answer: Ultrapar's main products include gasoline, diesel, ethanol, surfactants, and logistics services.
